dict.acceptation: 偶尔的，不经常的；特殊场合的；临时的；

sent.orig: Everything was quiet, aside from the occasional sound of a car in the distance.
sent.trans: 除了远处偶尔有汽车的声响外，四周一片寂静。

sent.orig: Added a security measure to prevent an occasional bug where your SMAW rocket continuously fires.
sent.trans: 增加了一个安全测量数据结构以防止一个偶然出现的SMAW火箭发射器不断的发射的错误。

sent.orig: Occasional music was played at the graduation.
sent.trans: 毕业仪式上演奏了庆典的音乐。

sent.orig: But I could easily detect an occasional wishful glance toward the bunch of plantains.
sent.trans: 如果我稍稍动一下，它就像闪电一样逃走，过一会再来打探。

sent.orig: The occasional failed project or neglected opportunity does not jeopardized overall progress.
sent.trans: 偶然失败的项目或失误的机会并没有影响总的进展。
